reporting-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

description.narrative: This activity focused on data collection for midline survey, submission of a manuscript to journal for publication and review of DHIS2 family planning data for central 2 region

participating-org.narrative: Makerere University School of Public Health

activity-date.narrative: All activities were conducted as planned on the project calender

recipient-country.narrative: Funds were sent by the lead organization to Uganda. All the spent funds were reimbursed and fees paid

sector.narrative: 72.4% of the planned budget was spent on the the planned activities
